title: Why Bluetooth device cannot pair to phone?
answer:
A.)Cannot find the phone in Bluetooth device. 

 -Make sure the Bluetooth is active and visible. 

 B.)Cannot pair with Bluetooth earphone. 

 -Make sure the earphone is in connecting mode (different device should operate as manual) 

 C.)Cannot send file to other device. 

 -Â Both devices is agree to share file and distance is not out of range.
